attributes.additional_details: He’s an incredible caring human being and what a bloke doing all his fundraising for MND
attributes.background: Kevin needs a knighthood for all his support to his friend Rob burrows and all his fundraising for MND

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
